name: AroundClock
description:
❔What is this game?

This is an entry for TriJam #155, created in 1h31m using Crisp-game-lib.

💬Synopsis

You are spinning around a dial. Stop the occasional enemy from trying to attack the dial and make it count the minutes! ...... Your bullets will sometimes damage the dial.

🎮Controls
  • While Hold, you rotate at a faster speed than normal; Release to fire a bullet.
🔍Credits
  • Game engine: Crisp-game-lib
  • Sound: Automatic generation by Crisp-game-lib
  • Translate this document: DeepL
  • Other tools: VSCode
